Our Team

Little bit about us

Our team consits of 3 person for now. We all come from different backgrounds and bring something new to the team. We want to make difference and change the world to be better.

Kate

CEO

Kate is one of the starting members. Kate has very good views of the future and leads the company to bigger waters.

Michael

Developer

Michale is second starting member. Michael likes challenges and is very motivated to invent new wasy to do things easier than before

Jack

Designer
